summary: A simple follower mod. It is the first one I have made. Rel is an archer class and can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. Like I said, she is a simple follower, so all you have to do is talk to her to make her follow.
descriptionHtml:
A simple follower mod. It is the first one I have made. Rel is an archer class and can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. Like I said, she is a simple follower, so all you have to do is talk to her to make her follow.

In the future, I plan to have her custom voice acted, but with all things, this will take time. Feel free to leave a comment on what you think I should add to this follower.
author: Twsister2361
